about

hi! i'm abby, i'm an artist, scientist, and enjoyer of colloquialisms.


the low-speed spoon is space i created as a place to house my portfolio of art, design, and data-vis projects. mostly this space is just for me. it turns out they let just anyone make a website. but, if you've found yourself here, i hope you enjoy poking around!


what is a low-speed spoon?


the low-speed spoon is the little one. the high-speed spoon is the big one. obviously.


unbeknownst to me until a much later age than one might hope, this is one among many entries you may only find in my family dictionary. see also: the magic box.


so, yes, i am the proud owner a domain name that was, unsurprisingly, available. why? well. in short, it makes me happy.
